title: Dead Days: Season Six
description: Back in October 2013, a chaotic infection spread across the globe, turning the majority of the population into bloodthirsty zombies.The weak fell. Many of the strong fell, too. But some fought. They did things they weren't proud of. They made gut-wrenching decisions and faced up to dark realities in order to live.Dead Days is the story of a group of those survivors.Season Six of the thrilling, suspenseful post apocalyptic series joins our survivors in a very new, different world. Several months have passed since Mr Fletch's devastating attack on the MLZ. Life for our survivors has changed significantly. Riley is no longer in a position of leadership or responsibility--and that's just the way he likes it.But when a catastrophic series of events rock the MLZ from within and stun the group to their very core, Riley is forced to step up once more in order to restore some sense of normality to their safe haven. However, it soon becomes clear that normality is far from possible in a world where the infection is rapidly developing terrifying new abilities...â€¨Abilities that threaten to tear humanity apart. For good.There will be blood. There will be tears. In the Dead Days, nobody is safe.
author: Ryan Casey
